summary:
New Caledonia is a group of islands in the Pacific Ocean, located near Vanuatu and Australia. It is a unique part of France, with its own special rules. The islands include Grande Terre, the Loyalty Islands, and more. People call Grande Terre "le Caillou," meaning "the stone."

The indigenous people, called Kanaks, make up a large part of the population, but there are also people of European, Polynesian, and other ethnicities. The capital is Noum√©a. New Caledonia is divided into three provinces, with different ethnic groups living in each.
title: New Caledonia
